_description: A tag by William Womyndham, Canon of Kirkeby — one couplet

CamTCC1144.Transcription:
Euer cursyd be that manThat callyth me thorpe for
                    womyndham
CamTCC1144.Note: Added to originally blank space at bottom of page.
CamTCC1144.Editions:
Mooney,  Linne R. 
             The Index of Middle English Prose: Handlist XI: Manuscripts in the
                Library of Trinity College, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: Brewer, 1995: 99.
